title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.12 - Atmosphere above piston-waterless holders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.12 - Atmosphere above piston-waterless holders

State Regulations

At least once each week a test shall be made of the quality
of the atmosphere above the piston. Smoking and use of devices of any kind that
might ignite an explosive mixture shall not be permitted in the piston chamber. All electric lights in space above piston shall be of the vapor-proof type. Electric motors, electric wiring and devices for all uses shall be in
accordance with the Fire Underwriters requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
256.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
